<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Riding Pony](/Monsters.aspx?ID=265)</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 209</row>

**Perception** +4; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">

**Dex** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7

**Will** +4 

</row>

**Buck** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +5,
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The riding pony Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

</column>
